topics.body: I was going to post a long comment here, but I think I can make my point as succint as humanly possible: how many modern animes do you know of featuring a plucky happy potentially autistic main character with a tragic past, a emo, a tsunadere and has the characters screaming for five minutes powering up?  I call it the Naruto effect for obvious reasons.
